You are given a deck of $n$ cards ($n$ is even) with a positive integer written on each card.  $n/2$ players will play a card game.  Each player receives two cards.  

Find a way to distribute the cards so that the sum of the numbers on each player's two cards is equal. 

**Input:**

* The first line contains the number of cards, $n$.
* The second line contains the $n$ numbers representing the values on each card.

**Output:**

* Print $n/2$ pairs of numbers. Each pair represents the two cards given to one player.

You have an even number of numbered cards.  Two players will each receive two cards.  Find a way to give out the cards so that each player has the same total value from their two cards.
